meta.title: Embed
meta.description: Create responsive video or slideshow embeds based on the width of the parent by creating an intrinsic ratio that scales on any device.

props.description: Type of embed. Possible values are 'iframe', 'video', 'embed' and 'object'
Aspect ratio of the embed. Supported values are '16by9', '21by9', '4by3', and '1by1' and are translated to CSS classes. Refer to the docs for more details
